text: I think it would be nice to add the name of the person who uploaded the file on the file manager dashboard.
Invited our new FE on file manager to this slack
Hi what can I assist with?
Hi Evan i was wondering if its possible to add a column with the name of the person who uplodaed the file in the file manager
We donâ€™t currently store that, but we plan to

Is it possible to mirror the multicheck options on the bottom of the file manager? For example, say i am going through and i start checking  off itemsand get to the bottom, i have to scroll up (first world problems) but having the options repeated on the bottom  would be awesome

or even add the date created to the details pane of an item so it shows date created and date updated. I am trying to organize our file manager and I want to put the items like blog images into a structure based on when they were created so like `blog_images > 2018-01` and those are all the images on the blogs for that month

also having a column where there is a yes/no check for "used in cos templates or not" would be nice to see from a quick view. Some portals probably have alot of files that are not being used so they can easily be identified in the design manager listing without having to go into the details
and last thing, the ability to do different types of searches like "type:pdf" so you can see all the items in the filemanager that are type of pdf
